iUSEiSEE: Learning to use the package iSEE

Source: R/iUSEiSEE-pkg.R
iUSEiSEE-pkg.Rd

This package provides the material for a fully fledged one-day workshop on the iSEE package.

See also

Useful links:

  • https://iSEE.github.io/iUSEiSEE/

  • Report bugs at https://github.com/iSEE/iUSEiSEE/issues
